page.title: 06OBJECTIONS TO LANDFILL
page.content: I don't think the welbeck scheme should go ahead. I used to live in Queensway so I know what it's like.The pit trucks make beeps when they reverse and you can distinctly hear them from a mile away-maybe less.Then new road that they propose to build will cause a lot of stress for people who live nearby. (Many letters and petitions have been (submitted in protest against the (scheme by the residents of Heath, (Kirkthorpe,Stanley Ferry and (Goosehill.) Controversal issues include noise, smoke,dust,smells ect. (The landfill will take many decades (to complete.The final say on the way (forward at Welbeck rests with the (Enviroment Secretary,Mr Patrick (Jenkin.Future generations would (benefit if the scheme went ahead.)
